description: Deletes the permissions boundary for the specified IAM user.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Compromised cloud accounts can be manipulated by deleting permissions boundaries, giving adversaries increased permissions to execute further malicious activities.
Deleting the permissions boundary could be part of a broader strategy to disable or modify security tools or settings to avoid detection.

securityImplications: Attackers might use DeleteUserPermissionsBoundary to remove restrictions and gain unauthorized access to AWS resources.
